name: Deviners Misery
description:
A mysterious fortune teller living in a small village was in shock when he found out, that his beloved and all treasured tarot cards had been stolen from the townfolk to mock him since they do not believe in his abilitys.

Just 3 cards were left which seemed to be dropped by the thieves when they were running away.

All in anger he gets up to find the thieves and regain his Tarot cards so he can betray *caugh* help the nice people with his divination again.

This game has been created for the htk Game Jam | 2021 Ice Edition. Most of the music/sounds are from weloveindies.com.

created with the following team:

sleepSI ; simsa55 ; Nightkitty07 ; canan-chan ; Ubiiiiii
